setting.title: Enquiry
setting.columnlabels: Enquiry Date,Existing Customer,Company Name,Campaign,Subject,Contact Person,Designation, Product,Landline No,Mobile No,Description,Other Info,Remarks,Address,Annual Revenue,Website,Email Id, Skype Id,Employee Strength,City,Area,Assigned To,Communication Source,Enquiry Status,Enquiry For,Won,Reject,Cancel,Opportunity,Cold,Hot,Hold,Time,Am Pm,Last Activity,Tele Calling Id
setting.query: SELECT * FROM tbl_enquiry JOIN tbl_client ON enquiry_clientid=client_clientid JOIN tbl_campaign ON enquiry_campaignid=campaign_campaignid JOIN tbl_designation ON enquiry_designationid=designation_designationid JOIN tbl_product ON enquiry_productid=product_productid JOIN tbl_city ON enquiry_cityid=city_cityid JOIN tbl_area ON enquiry_areaid=area_areaid LEFT JOIN tbl_employee ON enquiry_employeeid=employee_employeeid JOIN tbl_communicationsource ON enquiry_communicationsourceid=communicationsource_communicationsourceid JOIN tbl_enquirystatus ON enquiry_enquirystatusid=enquirystatus_enquirystatusid JOIN tbl_enquiryfor ON enquiry_enquiryforid=enquiryfor_enquiryforid
setting.where: enquiry_enquirydate BETWEEN '$enquiry_enquirydate_from$' AND '$enquiry_enquirydate_to$' AND ('$enquiry_clientid$' = '0' OR enquiry_clientid = '$enquiry_clientid$') AND ('$enquiry_campaignid$' = '0' OR enquiry_campaignid = '$enquiry_campaignid$') AND ('$enquiry_designationid$' = '0' OR enquiry_designationid = '$enquiry_designationid$') AND ('$enquiry_productid$' = '0' OR enquiry_productid = '$enquiry_productid$') AND ('$enquiry_cityid$' = '0' OR enquiry_cityid = '$enquiry_cityid$') AND ('$enquiry_areaid$' = '0' OR enquiry_areaid = '$enquiry_areaid$') AND ('$enquiry_communicationsourceid$' = '0' OR enquiry_communicationsourceid = '$enquiry_communicationsourceid$') AND ('$enquiry_enquirystatusid$' = '0' OR enquiry_enquirystatusid = '$enquiry_enquirystatusid$') AND ('$enquiry_enquiryforid$' = '0' OR enquiry_enquiryforid = '$enquiry_enquiryforid$') AND enquiry_followupsdate BETWEEN '$enquiry_followupsdate_from$' AND '$enquiry_followupsdate_to$' AND enquiry_visitsdate BETWEEN '$enquiry_visitsdate_from$' AND '$enquiry_visitsdate_to$' AND ('$enquiry_employeeid$' = '0' OR enquiry_employeeid = '$enquiry_employeeid$')
